resources.string: Save your lists in an external folder
From the list edition window, under the \'more options\' button.
From the list creation window, under the \'more options\' button.
Pull the content of your list down to refresh it in case the file has been updated by someone else elsewhere.
Click the "âŒ„" button the top of the screen to access the settings.
Click the share icon to share your list as text with someone else.
You can see this release note again from the settings screen.
Save your lists on your SD Card
You can now save your lists on your SD Card ! (experimental)
You can now choose between dark and light theme in the settings.
